title: Subpart 1727-8 - Succession Requirements
content:
Subpart 1727-8 - Succession Requirements

State Regulations
§ 1727-8.1 - General
§ 1727-8.2 - Vacating of apartment by tenant
§ 1727-8.3 - Special succession provisions in the event of the death of a tenant/cooperator
§ 1727-8.4 - Action by housing company and by the division
§ 1727-8.5 - Staff housing
§ 1727-8.6 - Repealed

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
